ðŸ“– Summary: EyeGestures is an open-source Python library designed for eye-tracking and gaze estimation using standard webcams and phone cameras. It aims to democratize access to eye-tracking technology by eliminating the need for expensive, dedicated hardware. A JavaScript port, EyeGesturesLite, is also available.
